reviewText: All truth passes through three stages. First, it is ridiculed. Second, it is violently opposed. Third, it is accepted as being self-evident.- Arthur Schopenhauer, German philosopher (1788 - 1860)Every American and every one else must see this documentary. The scientific facts and forensic evidence are irrefutable. Engineered demolition and controlled explosive detonations, not the impacts of two commercial jet aircraft or burning jet fuel, caused synchronized implosions that led to the controlled and symmetrical collapse of three World Trade Center (WTC) Tower Buildings in New York City on September 11, 2001, and contributed to the deaths of most of the 2,977 victims. This documentary film presents the clear facts, the scientific evidence, and original video footage of the synchronized and orchestrated demolition of the three skyscraper buildings. Many learned scientists, architects, highly-experienced demolition specialists, and other experts in America and around the world have analyzed and studied the scientific evidence and the video footage in this documentary, and, now, they know that controlled demolition and planted explosive devices caused the synchronized implosions that led to the controlled symmetrical collapse of the three skyscrapers: 1 WTC, 2 WTC, and 7 WTC.The question is, "Why have the majority of the American people and others not accepted these facts, the evidence, and the truth?" The answer is, "All truth passes through three stages. For most people, this truth has not reached the third stage, yet."Today, many people do not know, cannot comprehend, or refuse to accept the facts and scientific evidence that prove that synchronized explosive detonations caused the implosions that led to the controlled and symmetrical collapse of the 110-story North Tower (Tower 1 or 1 WTC), the 110-story South Tower (Tower 2 or 2 WTC), and the 47-story 7 World Trade Center, or 7 WTC, in New York City on September 11, 2001. I think that most open-minded people who see this documentary will understand the truth and eventually will accept it is as being self-evident.
summary: Engineered demolition and planted explosive devices caused symmetrical collapse of three World Trade Center towers on 9/11/2001

reviewText: This is a good film and worth your time. However, I doubt you need all the engineers to explain a conspiracy theory. The instant reactions of Bush and Cheney are enough. Yes, the President and Vice President must be moved to safe quarters in the event of a threat of immediate harm. But there was no threat of immediate harm. The military cleared any threats within minutes of the attacks. But Bush was on his way to hide behind second graders in Florida, and Cheney to Colorado. Any real President or leader, like FDR or Reagan or Churchill, knowing immediate threats had been removed, would have flown directly to NYC as fast as possible; they would have not run away like cowards who already knew the disaster was going to happen. There is one problem with this theory, and it's the same problem that plagues engineers in this film and others like it, however: the actual terrorists involved in the attack. The common denominator between them was a radical form of Islam. A huge amount of planning had to be involved, and these people were, as it were, the grunts willing to give their lives to their "cause." It is impossible to imagine Bush or any other significant American spending enough time with Muslim extremists to pull something like this off. Evidence would be everywhere. There is no motive. And all the favored conspiracy theories are therefore dead.

reviewText: I have watched every available 911 documentary and this one is the best.  These experts are highly accredited professionals, not quacks. I will grant you that it is hard to hear and accept what they tell us but for those folks like me who are constantly in search of the truth of what really happened that day, we had to accept and be prepared for some unpleasant facts.  Watch this and see if it does not change/confirm, even slightly, your opinon of what happened.

reviewText: Way back in 2004, when the truth movement was in its relative infancy, Amy Goodman of Democracy Now! hosted a debate between 9/11 scholar David Ray Griffin and official 9/11 myth defender Chip Berlet.  At 47:25, highly sympathetic to the "debunker" Berlet, Goodman challenged Griffin:AMY GOODMAN: Name just one. Name JUST ONE structural engineering expert who said it is not feasible that the planes caused the towers to go down.DRG: I'm sorry, I don't have that information at my fingertips at this moment.CHIP BERLET:  There was an extensive investigation done... [blah blah blah]This was of course in 2004.  Steven Jones had not yet come onto the scene, and Architects and Engineers for 9/11 Truth was still far into the future.  Heck, even Loose Change hadn't been made yet.  So back then it was far easier for the professional "debunkers" and genuine skeptics to dismiss our side's claims.Since we now have just a tad more than "just one" structural engineer who agrees with us, I think it's time for a rematch with Amy Goodman!"Experts Speak Out" is an incredible compendium of over 40 metallurgists, firefighters, demolition experts, architects, mechanical engineers, structural engineers, and more.  One after another after another, and it's extremely compelling.I would like to take this public review space to also call to task (dare I say "shame") a person called Bryan Sodemann, who is Assistant Program Director of a North Carolina PBS station, UNCTV.  Sodemann used his executive power at the station to refuse to follow suit of what Denver's PBS station did.  Pasted below is a portion of his email response to a truth activist who requested that UNCTV air ESO.  Here was Sodemann's "justification" for why it would be "irresponsible journalism" for his local PBS affiliate to air ESO:"There are dozens, if not hundreds, of 9/11 conspiracy videos floating around the country. I have sat through a few of them and they range from painfully boring to quite entertaining. But none of them dares to actually speak with people who disagree with them. Despite describing itself as "non-partisan" and "strictly scientific," 9/11 Explosive Evidence appears to be no exception to this rule. It claims to represent the views of "over 1700 architects and engineers," but ignores the opinions of the vast majority of the hundreds of thousands of people employed in these professions in the United States."By airing 9/11 Explosive Evidence, we would essentially be endorsing the notion that our government knew about, participated in, and/or covered up the mass murder of nearly 3,000 Americans. Furthermore, we would be doing so without following any of the journalistic standards or core values that make, as you are aware, public television the trusted institution that it is today."I would retort: There have been a bunch of documentaries, such as NOVA's "Why the Towers Fell," which present ONLY the official side.  The NOVA documentary doesn't give a "balanced" documentary featuring some experts believing the official version and some experts featuring the truth movement's version.  Yet I would imagine that the NOVA flick, at some point, has been shown on EVERY PBS station in the country.  So any protests from PBS directors or others that this is a one-sided film hold no water.  Besides, I don't think any flicks that support the official version personally interview THIS MANY experts, as ESO does.Also, Sodemann claims that ESO "ignores the opinions of the vast majority of the hundreds of thousands of people employed in these professions..."  This is untrue.  Far from being ignored, the "opinions" of the "vast majority" are addressed very soundly, and are methodically debunked.  For example, experts in ESO explain in painstaking detail why what we saw on TV were not "progressive collapses" or "pancake collapses."Finally, of course, far from the issue of "balance," Sodemann's real reason finally comes out in the wash: "By airing 9/11 Explosive Evidence, we would essentially be endorsing the notion that our government knew about, participated in, and/or covered up the mass murder of nearly 3,000 Americans."  In other words, the political implications of these scientific facts are too awkward and uncomfortable.  That, sir, is cowardice.Anyway, bravo, AE911Truth!  The rational and sane world thanks you!  And bravo to Colorado's CPTV, the first and so far only PBS station in the country to have the courage to actually air this instead of proffering cowardly rationalizations as to why it shouldn't be shown!

reviewText: Why is this documentary not getting more attention? Watched this and was completely blown away. I am steadfastly convinced that the collapse of World Trade Towers 1 and 2 and also Building 7 were all CONTROLLED DEMOLITIONS. As explained by those in the know, and you will see it yourself, these buildings dropped in free fall without any resistance whatsoever. In fact, one tower dropped in all of 8 seconds and the other in 7 seconds. It defies all logic to say this was strictly because of a plane hitting the upper floors. Why no resistance at the bottom half of the towers? Building 7 drops in a virtual straight line to the ground. Don't believe me? Watch this and analyze it for yourself. Actually, more than once in the film is the free fall collapse of Building 7 identified as "the Smoking Gun." Building 7 was not struck by a plane, did have some fires within, but did not suffer sufficient damage to totally collapse.Explain the many explosions after the planes hit while you're at it. Also, all this melted steel was found, and jet fuel which heats at around 700 degrees does not melt steel. What does melt steel is thermite.  So why did the Towers looked like they had been shoved through a paper shredder?  Why was all the steel removed promptly and sold to China without proper examination?I'm neither physicist, architect nor demolition expert, but the case is presented by people with top notch credentials. It all makes complete sense and has the ring of complete and utter truth. The people behind the 9/11 truth movement even moved via the Freedom of Information Act to reopen the 9/11 investigation (which was considered superficial), but they were denied because doing so would endanger the public. Huh?  Anyone with a continuing interest of 9/11 needs to watch this film. Initially, I resisted this because after 9/11 I read and watched so much about the event because I worked directly across the street from the WTC and had an overwhelming need to find out everything. Got to the point where I was so saturated I thought I knew everything. Well, I was WRONG. This film reveals the truth behind the worst day in United States' history: Tuesday, September 11, 2001.VERDICT: U.S. Government coverup.

reviewText: I notice that all of the one-star reviewers accuse the filmmakers of putting this out just to make money. There's one problem with that: I saw it when it was first released on YouTube, where you can still watch it for FREE. I thought it was very impressive.I'm not an expert on 9/11; my field of expertise is the JFK assassination. But I have read a few books and many articles, and watched several documentaries on the subject. While I don't have all the answers to what happened on 9/11, I am positive that the official story stinks very badly. I suspect the truth would be easier for Americans to believe if they knew more about Gladio and the secret armies in Europe, and the relationship between organized crime, NATO and the CIA.The official conspiracy theory is propped up by people who nonetheless attack "conspiracy theories," spouting the same arguments, insults and assertions that we hear from those who defend the Warren Commission.

reviewText: At the time of this writing, there are 1700+, and growing, signatures of both registered architects and engineers, from all fields, who agree with the video's result, in that the twin towers, and most certainly, building 7, were brought down using controlled demolition, and probably by using Thermite charges. There are more that 10,000 other signatures, ranging from university professors and engineering consultants, to be added to the 1700 above, whom also agree.This video documents the theory of how the buildings were probably destroyed, scientifically, and debunks the conspiracy "debunkers", like the NIST and Popular Mechanics, whom are both proven to be categorically wrong, using scientific engineering methods. Whom do you believe, a dozen individuals who are tied to the government, or 1700+ engineers and architects, plus over 10,000 technical supporters?I am one of the co-signers of the petition related to this video, and am an engineering consultant. I specialize in heavy weldments (similar to the buildings structures), the welding of, lifting, and positioning of the same. As an example, I was working with machines that could lift railroad cars like toys, and turn them upside down, and back again. My training in this field, especially welding and metallurgy, tells me that the fires in the buildings never got close to the temperatures needed to deform the steel enough to cause a collapse, nor did they burn anywhere long enough. You have to have oxygenated flames to cause that much heat, similar to a cutting or pre-heating flame to do it, and the fires in the buildings were oxygen starved, producing a black smoke.I hate to say that there is a conspiracy behind this, as I truly do not know, but the NIST and the US Government report about the buildings is dead wrong, and is proven by this video.
summary: A must see for any who wishes to know the real truth!
